text: Daouda Karamoko Bamba (born 5 March 1995) is an Ivorian footballer who plays for Brann. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Kongsvinger |2013 |Adeccoligaen |12||4||0||0||colspan="2"|–||12||4 |- !colspan="2"|Total !12!!4!!0!!0!!-!!-!!12!!4 |- |rowspan="6" valign="center"|Kristiansund |2014 |1. divisjon |26||4||3||0||colspan="2"|–||29||4 |- |2015 |rowspan="2" valign="center"|OBOS-ligaen |11||5||0||0||colspan="2"|–||11||5 |- |2016 |28||20||1||1||colspan="2"|–||29||21 |- |2017 |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Eliteserien |22||7||3||1||colspan="2"|–||25||8 |- |2018 |18||7||3||0||colspan="2"|–||21||7 |- !colspan="2"|Total !105!!43!!10!!2!!-!!-!!115!!45 |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Brann |2018 |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Eliteserien |11||4||0||0||colspan="2"|–||11||4 |- |2019 |21||7||2||0||2||1||25||8 |- |2020 |20||6||0||0||colspan="2"|–||20||6 |- !colspan="2"|Total !52!!17!!2!!0!!2!!1!!56!!18 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !169!!64!!12!!2!!2!!1!!182!!67 |} ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Ivorian footballers Category:Eliteserien players Category:Kongsvinger IL Toppfotball players Category:Kristiansund BK players Category:Ivorian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway Category:Ivorian expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:Norwegian First Division players Category:Association football forwards
